dialogue.text: Hello. What are you doing here?
Who, the Duke? He's in his study, on the first floor.
Ahh, I see all the newcomers arriving in Lumbridge, fresh-faced and eager for adventure. I remember you...
You've spent [amount] days, [amount] hours, [amount] minutes in the world since you arrived [amount] days ago.
Ummm... a little green hat? Yes, a seagull picked it up and flew off.
So it seems! I'm afraid I didn't happen to see which way it went.
Oh my aching feet! A chair! Just what I've been needing! I'm going to go sit by the fountain, so pretty this time of year.
Of course *hic* I love a good *hic* party.
I have a *hic* great party trick *hic*
You are in Lumbridge Castle, in the Kingdom of Misthalin. Across the river, the road leads north to Varrock, and to the west lies Draynor Village.
